Reviews.Title: Terrible DVD - Very Dry, Very Boring
Reviews.Author: Kimberly D. Gauthier "Kimberly Gauthier, The ...
Reviews.Content: I ordered this DVD after watching two Nikon DVDs (my boyfriend's camera).  The Nikon DVDs were so helpful and I could barely make it through, because I wanted to go out and take pics.  I popped this DVD on the second it arrived and sat in shock at how boring it was.  I learned more about my Sony Alpha from the Nikon DVDs than from this one; and not because it doesn't teach you, it's just so boring.It would have been nice if it could at least be used as a reference to use whenever I have a good question, but I've gotten more from Scott Kelby's books (which don't reference Alphas).  Basically, I was extremely disappointed and found this to be a huge waste of money and time.Don't bother purchasing.

Reviews.Title: Great DVD!
Reviews.Author: Ricardo Elizondo
Reviews.Content: This was a great DVD and allowed me to start taking pictures and understanding my camera right away!
